snippet: One of the highest-selling female artists in United States history, Britney Spears could bring a youthful energy to Simon Cowell's singing competition, whose first-season ratings were respectable but not what Mr. Cowell predicted.
abstract: One of the highest-selling female artists in United States history, Britney Spears could bring a youthful energy to Simon Cowell's singing competition, whose first-season ratings were respectable but not what Mr. Cowell predicted.

headline.main: Britney Spears Likely to Join Judges of 'X Factor'
headline.print_headline: Britney Spears Expected To Join ‘X Factor’
